get.description:
2 credits per request
Get comprehensive data about all cryptocurrencies: - Price, market cap, and volume - Price changes (1h, 24h, 7d) - Supply information - Trading metrics - Social links and metadata Optional Parameters: - currency: Price display currency (default: USD) - limit & skip: Pagination controls - includeRiskScore: Add risk analysis data - categories: Filter by coin categories - blockchains: Filter by blockchain networks Sorting Options: - sortBy: rank, price, volume, etc. - sortDir: asc or desc

parameters.name: riskScore~greaterThan
parameters.description: Risk Score Greater Than (Only if includeRiskScore=true)

get.description:
1 credits per request
Returns detailed information about a specific cryptocurrency using coinId.

parameters.name: coinId
parameters.description: The identifier of coin, which you received from /coins call response.

200.description: Get Coin with global avg prices

get.description:
3 credits per request
Returns historical chart data for a specific cryptocurrency using coinId.

parameters.name: coinId
parameters.description: The identifier of coin, which you received from /coins call response.

200.description: Get Historical global avg price chart

get.description:
4 credits per request
Returns the historical average price of a specific cryptocurrency for a given date.

5 credits per request
Returns historical price data for a specific cryptocurrency on a selected exchange.

2 credits per request
Returns a list of supported cryptocurrency exchanges available on CoinStats.

200.description: Returns a list of supported cryptocurrency exchanges available on CoinStats.

get.description:
3 credits per request
Returns a list of tickers for a specific cryptocurrency across multiple exchanges.

1 credits per request
Returns the list of blockchains supported by CoinStats.

40 credits per request
Get cryptocurrency balances for any blockchain wallet: - Token balances across multiple networks - NFT holdings - Current USD values - Historical transactions Required: - address: Wallet address to query - connectionId: Blockchain network(s) to check - Single network (e.g., "ethereum") - Multiple networks ("ethereum,polygon") - "all" for all supported networks Features: - Multi-chain support - ERC20 token detection - NFT balance tracking - Historical data access

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: The identifier of connection, which you received from /wallet/blockchains call response.

get.description:
40 credits per request
Returns the balance data for a provided wallet address across all CoinStats-EVM compatible supported networks. You can choose to query individual networks or all available networks at a fixed cost of 400 credits. Each network query costs 40 credits.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address for which the balance is being queried. Must be a valid string representing an EVM-compatible wallet address.

parameters.name: networks
parameters.description: Specifies the blockchain networks to query for the wallet balance. Can be a single network (e.g., "ethereum") or a comma-separated list of networks (e.g., "ethereum,polygon,binance"). If not provided, the default is "all" supported networks.

get.description:
3 credits per request
Returns the syncing status of the provided wallet address with the blockchain network.

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: The identifier of connection, which you received from /wallet/blockchains call response.

409.description: Transactions not synced. Please call PATCH /transactions

get.description:
40 credits per request
Returns transaction data for a specific wallet address. Note: Make sure to synchronize the transactions first by calling PATCH /transactions to ensure accurate and up-to-date information.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Please include the date in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Please include the date in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: The identifier of connection, which you received from /wallet/blockchains call response.

coinData.description: Only sent if there is at least 1 coin in transactions

profitLoss.description: Only sent if there is at least 1 coin in transactions

id.description: Sent only when fee is another transaction object

409.description: Transactions not synced. Please call PATCH /transactions

patch.description:
50 credits per request
Cost per network: 50 credits. Selecting all networks: 500 credits. Initiates the syncing process to update transaction data for a specific wallet. By sending a PATCH request with the wallet address as a parameter, you trigger the syncing process to retrieve the latest transaction data for the wallet.

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: The identifier of connection, which you received from /wallet/blockchains call response.  Can be a single network (e.g., "ethereum") or a comma-separated list of networks or "all" for all connections.

get.description:
40 credits per request
Cost per network: 40 credits. Selecting all networks: 400 credits. "Returns wallet chart data for specific time ranges displayed on the CoinStats website. Note: Make sure transactions are synced first by calling PATCH /transactions to retrieve accurate chart data."

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address for which the chart is being queried.

parameters.name: connectionId
parameters.description: The identifier of connection, which you received from /wallet/blockchains call response.  Can be a single network (e.g., "ethereum") or a comma-separated list of networks or "all" for all connections.

result.description: Array of data points: [TIMESTAMP, USD, BTC, ETH]

get.description:
1 credits per request
Returns a list of exchange portfolio connections supported by CoinStats.

post.description:
10 credits per request
Get your cryptocurrency exchange balances: - Real-time balance information - All coins and tokens in your account - Current value in USD and BTC - Available and locked amounts Required: - connectionId: Exchange identifier (e.g., "binance", "coinbase") - connectionFields: Exchange API credentials - apiKey: Your exchange API key - apiSecret: Your exchange API secret Security Note: - Use read-only API keys when possible - Keep your API credentials secure - Enable IP restrictions on exchange side

connectionFields.description: The credentials given from exchange. key, secret etc.

get.description:
3 credits per request
Returns the syncing status of the exchange portfolio, indicating whether the portfolio is fully synced with the exchange or still in progress.

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: The identifier of portfolio, which you received from /exchange/balance call response.

get.description:
4 credits per request
Returns transaction data for a specific exchange by portfolioId. Note: Make sure the exchange is synced first by calling PATCH /sync for up to date infromation.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Please include the date in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Please include the date in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: The identifier of portfolio, which you received from /exchange/balance response.

parameters.name: portfolioId

patch.description:
20 credits per request
Initiates the syncing process for the given exchange portfolio by portfolioId.

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: The identifier of portfolio, which you received from /exchange/balance call response.

success.description: The identifier of portfolio, which you received from /exchange/balance call response.

get.description:
1 credits per request
Get detailed information about fiat currencies: - Complete list of supported fiat currencies - Current exchange rates - Currency symbols and names - Associated images/icons Use this data to: - Convert cryptocurrency values to fiat - Display fiat currency information - Access currency metadata

2 credits per request
Get the most popular NFT collections right now: - Top trending collections by volume and activity - Floor prices and market caps - Collection statistics and metadata - Trading volume and price trends Results are sorted by: - Recent sales volume - Market activity - Social engagement - Price movement

40 credits per request
Returns a list of NFT assets owned by a wallet address.

3 credits per request
Returns detailed information about an NFT collection using collectionAddress.

8 credits per request
Returns the list of NFT assets associated with NFT Collection by collectionAddress.

5 credits per request
Returns detailed information about a specific NFT asset.

2 credits per request
Returns the list of news sources.

5 credits per request
Returns the list of cryptocurrency news articles with pagination.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Please include the date in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Please include the date in ISO 8601 format

get.description:
5 credits per request
Returns cryptocurrency news articles based on a specific type.

1 credits per request
Returns a news article by id.

1 credits per request
Get current global cryptocurrency market data: - Total market capitalization - 24h trading volume - Bitcoin dominance - Market trends and indicators This data provides a high-level overview of the entire crypto market's current state.

8 credits per request
Get detailed information about all coins in your portfolio, including: - Current holdings and their USD value - Profit/Loss (PnL) information - Performance metrics and statistics - Risk assessment scores (optional) Required: - shareToken: Get this from your CoinStats portfolio page by clicking "Share" and copying the token from the share URL Optional Parameters: - skip & limit: Control the number of results per page - includeRiskScore: Set to "true" to include risk metrics Note: This endpoint is only available for users with a Degen plan subscription.

parameters.name: shareToken
parameters.description: To access your Share Token Visit CoinStats Portfolio and make sure you are signed in to your account. In the top-right corner of the page, click on the Share button. This will bring up sharing preferences for your portfolio. Generate a Share Link. In the generated URL, the segment following /r/ (e.g., XXX) is your share token. Copy only that token (without additional slashes or characters). Use the Token in the API

get.description:
10 credits per request
Get historical performance data to visualize your portfolio's growth over time: - Total portfolio value at different time points - Performance metrics for various time ranges - Historical Profit/Loss (PnL) data Required: - shareToken: Get this from your CoinStats portfolio page by clicking "Share" and copying the token from the share URL Optional: - type: Specify the time range for the chart data (e.g., "24h", "1w", "1m", "1y") Note: This endpoint is only available for users with a Degen plan subscription.

parameters.name: shareToken
parameters.description: To access your Share Token Visit CoinStats Portfolio and make sure you are signed in to your account. In the top-right corner of the page, click on the Share button. This will bring up sharing preferences for your portfolio. Generate a Share Link. In the generated URL, the segment following /r/ (e.g., XXX) is your share token. Copy only that token (without additional slashes or characters). Use the Token in the API

get.description:
4 credits per request
Get a detailed history of all transactions in your portfolio: - Complete list of buy/sell operations - Transaction dates and amounts - Price information at time of transaction - Supports pagination for viewing large transaction sets Required: - shareToken: Get this from your CoinStats portfolio page by clicking "Share" and copying the token from the share URL Optional: - skip & limit: Control the number of transactions per page - currency: Specify the currency for price values - from & to: Filter transactions by date range Note: This endpoint is only available for users with a Degen plan subscription.

parameters.name: shareToken
parameters.description: To access your Share Token Visit CoinStats Portfolio and make sure you are signed in to your account. In the top-right corner of the page, click on the Share button. This will bring up sharing preferences for your portfolio. Generate a Share Link. In the generated URL, the segment following /r/ (e.g., XXX) is your share token. Copy only that token (without additional slashes or characters). Use the Token in the API

post.description:
4 credits per request
Add a new transaction to your manual portfolio: - Support for buy, sell, and transfer operations - Automatically updates your portfolio holdings - Validates transaction data before recording - Returns the details of the created transaction Required: - shareToken: Get this from your CoinStats portfolio page - Transaction details in request body: - coinId: The cryptocurrency's identifier - count: Amount (negative for sells) - date: Transaction timestamp (optional) - price: Price at time of transaction (optional) Optional: - notes: Add personal notes to the transaction - currency: Specify currency for price (default: USD) Note: This endpoint is only available for users with a Degen plan subscription.

parameters.name: shareToken
parameters.description: To access your Share Token Visit CoinStats Portfolio and make sure you are signed in to your account. In the top-right corner of the page, click on the Share button. This will bring up sharing preferences for your portfolio. Generate a Share Link. In the generated URL, the segment following /r/ (e.g., XXX) is your share token. Copy only that token (without additional slashes or characters). Use the Token in the API

coinId.description: Coin ID from CoinStats API. For fiats you can send coin ID like this: FiatCoinUSD.

count.description: Amount of coin. For sell transactions, this should be negative.

date.description: Transaction date in milliseconds. If not provided, current date will be used.

price.description: Price of coin in USD at the time of transaction.

portfolioId.description: If shared portfolio is not manual portfolio, then this field is required.

get.description:
1 credits per request
Get a complete list of supported fiat currencies: - Returns all currencies supported by CoinStats - Includes currency codes and exchange rates - Use these currency codes in other API endpoints Example Response: - USD: US Dollar - EUR: Euro - GBP: British Pound - And many more...

tags.name: Market Data
tags.description: The Market Data section of the API provides endpoints to access a wide range of market-related information, including cryptocurrency coins, ticker data, and fiat currency rates. This category offers comprehensive data to help users monitor and analyze the cryptocurrency market, track prices, and gain insights into market trends

tags.name: News
tags.description: The News section of the API allows you to access news articles and updates related to cryptocurrencies and the blockchain industry. It provides valuable information from various sources to keep you informed about the latest developments

tags.name: NFTs
tags.description: The NFT section of the API provides endpoints to interact with Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), which are unique digital assets stored on a blockchain. These endpoints allow you to retrieve information about NFTs, including collections, assets, trending NFTs, and specific assets associated with wallet addresses.

tags.name: Wallet Data
tags.description: The Wallet section of the API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints to manage and interact with wallets. It enables users to retrieve wallet balances, monitor syncing status, fetch transaction data, and synchronize wallet information with the blockchain. By integrating these endpoints into your application, you can offer robust wallet functionality to your users.

tags.name: Exchange Connection
tags.description: The Exchange Connection section of the API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints to manage and interact with exchanges. It enables users to retrieve exchange balances, monitor syncing status, fetch transaction data. By integrating these endpoints into your application, you can offer robust exchange portfolio tracking functionality to your users.

tags.name: Portfolio
tags.description: The Portfolio section of the API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints to manage and interact with Share Portfolios. It enables users to retrieve current Portfolio Coins and Transactions.

X-API-KEY.name: X-API-KEY
